name: tribble-sdk-monorepo
description: Tribble Platform SDK - Build GenAI applications with document ingestion, agent chat, and workflow automation

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:sdk && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:packages: npm run -w @tribble/sdk-core build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-agent build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-ingest build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-workflows build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-events build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-auth build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-queue build
